description:
Help Madeline survive her inner demons on her journey to the top of Celeste Mountain, in this super-tight,
hand-crafted platformer from the creators of multiplayer classic TowerFall.

0.1.0.description:
This is the initial release of this Archipelago Celeste world.

Please see [here](https://github.com/doshyw/Archipelago/blob/d77ba7ba8d8c42829f34517c91fcc19f753ff8aa/worlds/celeste/docs/celeste_en.md) for information on installing both the World and the Everest Mod.

Please see [here](https://github.com/doshyw/Archipelago/blob/d77ba7ba8d8c42829f34517c91fcc19f753ff8aa/worlds/celeste/docs/en_Celeste.md) for information on how this World works.

If you encounter any issues, you can report them on the [Issues page](https://github.com/doshyw/CelesteArchipelago/issues).
0.1.0.title: [ALPHA] Release 0.1.0

0.2.0.description:
Bugfixes:
- Fixed bug where loading Moon Berry crashed level
- Fixed bug where victory was not sent

Enhancements:
- Added Level 7A and 9A as victory conditions
- Made it so accessibility checks are performed on level entry

Please see [here](https://github.com/doshyw/Archipelago/blob/885c19d470477445df5fb2ff3c23c098f4a1da3d/worlds/celeste/docs/celeste_en.md) for information on installing both the World and the Everest Mod.

Please see [here](https://github.com/doshyw/Archipelago/blob/885c19d470477445df5fb2ff3c23c098f4a1da3d/worlds/celeste/docs/en_Celeste.md) for information on how this World works.

If you encounter any issues, you can report them on the [Issues page](https://github.com/doshyw/CelesteArchipelago/issues).
0.2.0.title: [ALPHA] Release 0.2.0

0.2.1.description:
REQUIRES EVEREST v4335

Bugfixes:
- Fixed bug where [Archipelago.MultiClient.Net](https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago.MultiClient.Net) wasn't correctly closing socket connection with server on return to Main Menu (causing freezes)

Please see [here](https://github.com/doshyw/Archipelago/blob/885c19d470477445df5fb2ff3c23c098f4a1da3d/worlds/celeste/docs/celeste_en.md) for information on installing both the World and the Everest Mod.

Please see [here](https://github.com/doshyw/Archipelago/blob/885c19d470477445df5fb2ff3c23c098f4a1da3d/worlds/celeste/docs/en_Celeste.md) for information on how this World works.

If you encounter any issues, you can report them on the [Issues page](https://github.com/doshyw/CelesteArchipelago/issues).
0.2.1.title: [ALPHA] Release 0.2.1

0.3.0.description:
**[Everest v4465]**

Majorly overhauled both the APWorld and Celeste Mod. Please see https://github.com/doshyw/Archipelago/pull/2 and https://github.com/doshyw/CelesteArchipelago/pull/31 for more information.

Please see [here](https://github.com/doshyw/Archipelago/blob/885c19d470477445df5fb2ff3c23c098f4a1da3d/worlds/celeste/docs/en_Celeste.md) for information on how this World works.

If you encounter any issues, you can report them on the [Issues page](https://github.com/doshyw/CelesteArchipelago/issues).

INSTALL GUIDE:
- Follow [Generating a Celeste game (offline)](https://github.com/doshyw/Archipelago/blob/885c19d470477445df5fb2ff3c23c098f4a1da3d/worlds/celeste/docs/celeste_en.md#generating-a-celeste-game-offline)
- The Archipelago setup guide is hosted at https://archipelago.gg/tutorial/Archipelago/setup/en for Step 4
- Follow [Setting up your Celeste client](https://github.com/doshyw/Archipelago/blob/885c19d470477445df5fb2ff3c23c098f4a1da3d/worlds/celeste/docs/celeste_en.md#setting-up-your-celeste-client)
0.3.0.title: [ALPHA] Release 0.3.0
